text.p: These are the leading stories in the Moroccan press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- King Hassan meets political parties' leaders over reform and legislative elections.
- Interior Minister Driss Basri meets members of foreign chambers of commerce to examine difficulties hampering investments.
- University teachers cancel strike after government agrees to consider their demand for educational reform.
- United Nations commission for children's rights advises Morocco to take measures to ensure their economic and social rights.
